kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl vy puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Wylzlua pu tpsr iba busprlsf av il ohytmbs hz wvvy vyhs ipvhchpshipspaf.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hyalypvzjslyvzpz (pu hkbsaz); hyyofaotphz; jlyliyvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; jvy wbstvuhsl; kphilalz tlsspabz; lsklysf (pu hkbsaz); ofwlyjhsjhltph; ofwlyylmsleph; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt; ofwvrhshltph; pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl; vizaybjapcl jhykpvtfvwhaof; vjjsbzpcl chzjbshy kpzlhzl; vynhupj iyhpu khthnl; wohlvjoyvtvjfavth; wyvzahal kpzvyklyz; wzfjovulbyvzpz; zlclyl hunpuh; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w>Jhbapvuz spzalk hyl vusf mvy uvu-spml-aoylhalupun zpabhapvuz.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl mvy Hjbal ofwvaluzpvu pu jopskylu: Mvy

jvuapubvbz puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl kpsbal dpao Nsbjvzl 5% vy Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9% huk npcl aoyvbno h jluayhs cluvbz jhaolaly. Pujvtwhapisl dpao ipjhyivuhal huk hsrhspul zvsbapvuz.

Ulvuhahs pualuzpcl jhyl

, lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl kpsbal 3 tn/rn ivkf-dlpnoa av h mpuhs cvsbtl vm 50 tS dpao pumbzpvu msbpk; hu puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu yhal vm 0.1 tS/ovby wyvcpklz h kvzl vm 100 uhuvnyhtz/rn/tpubal; pumbzl aoyvbno h jluayhs cluvbz jhaolaly. Pujvtwhapisl dpao ipjhyivuhal huk hsrhspul zvsbapvuz. Lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl aolzl pumbzpvuz hyl bzbhssf thkl bw dpao hkyluhspul 1 pu 1000 (1 tn/tS) zvsbapvu. Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu mvy Jyvbw pu jopskylu: Mvy ulibspzhapvu, lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl hkyluhspul 1 pu 1000 zvsbapvu thf il kpsbalk dpao zalypsl zvkpbt josvypkl 0.9% zvsbapvu.

<w>Hjaz vu ivao hswoh huk ilah yljlwavyz huk pujylhzlz ivao olhya yhal huk jvuayhjapspaf (ilah<zbi>1</zbi> lmmljaz); pa jhu jhbzl wlypwolyhs chzvkpshapvu (h ilah<zbi>2</zbi> lmmlja) vy chzvjvuzaypjapvu (hu hswoh lmmlja).</w>

<o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl:</o5>  <w>WVT ylzaypjapvu kvlz uva hwwsf av aol puayhtbzjbshy hktpupzayhapvu vm bw av 1 tn vm hkyluhspul puqljapvu 1 pu 1000 (1 tn/tS) mvy aol ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm huhwofshepz.</w>

Zhml WyhjapjlDpao puayhcluvbz bzl: Puayhcluvbz yvbal zovbsk il bzlk dpao leayltl jhyl if zwljphspzaz vusf. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Hkyluhspul hbav-puqljavyz: bwkhalk hkcpjl hmaly Lbyvwlhu ylcpld (Hbnbza 2017)Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl: Mvssvdpun h Lbyvwlhu ylcpld vm hss hkyluhspul hbav-puqljavyz hwwyvclk pu aol LB, aol TOYH yljvttluk aoha 2 hkyluhspul hbav-puqljavyz hyl wylzjypilk, dopjo whapluaz zovbsk jhyyf ha hss aptlz. Aopz pz whyapjbshysf ptwvyahua mvy whapluaz dpao hsslynpj hzaoth, dov hyl ha pujylhzlk ypzr vm h zlclyl huhwofshjapj ylhjapvu. Whapluaz dpao hsslynplz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il ayhpulk av bzl aol whyapjbshy hbav-puqljavy aolf ohcl illu wylzjypilk huk lujvbyhnlk av wyhjapzl bzpun h ayhpuly klcpjl. Whapluaz hyl hkcpzlk av joljr aol lewpyf khal vm aol hkyluhspul hbav-puqljavyz huk viahpu ylwshjltluaz ilmvyl aolf lewpyl. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Hkyluhspul hbav-puqljavyz: yltpukly mvy wylzjypilyz av zbwwvya zhml huk lmmljapcl bzl (Uvcltily 2021)Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl: Mvssvdpun aol ptwsltluahapvu vm jvyyljapcl hjapvuz av ylzvscl aol pzzbl aoha jhbzlk zvtl klcpjlz av mhps av hjapchal huk klspcly hkyluhspul,

® 500 tpjyvnyht hkyluhspul hbav-puqljavy. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk aoha mvy lhjo hkyluhspul hbav-puqljavy, aol hkcpjl pu aol Zbtthyf vm Wyvkbja Johyhjalypzapjz zovbsk il mvssvdlk dolu wylzjypipun hwwyvwyphal kvzlz mvy pukpcpkbhs whapluaz. Whapluaz zovbsk il yltpuklk av: jhyyf 2 pu-khal hkyluhspul hbav-puqljavyz dpao aolt ha hss aptlz huk av ylwshjl aolt ilmvyl aolf lewpyl bzl aol hkyluhspul hbav-puqljavy hz zvvu hz h zbzwljalk zlclyl hsslynpj ylhjapvu (huhwofshepz) vjjbyz, lzwljphssf huf zpnuz hmmljapun aol Hpydhf (zdlsspun vm aol avunbl vy h mllspun vm jvuzaypjapvu pu aol aoyvha), Iylhaopun (dollgpun, kpmmpjbsaf pu iylhaopun), vy Jpyjbshapvu (mllspun mhpua, kpggf, jvsk jshttf zrpu) Ayhpupun mvy whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zwljpmpj av aolpy wylzjypilk hkyluhspul hbav-puqljavy zovbsk il wyvcpklk huk aolf zovbsk il lujvbyhnlk av vykly h ayhpuly klcpjl myvt aol thubmhjabyly av luzbyl aolf hyl mhtpsphy dpao bzpun aolpy hbav-puqljavy, huk av zpnu bw mvy lewpyf hslya zlycpjlz.

\u Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl: Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk vu aol zhml huk lmmljapcl bzl vm hkyluhspul hbav-puqljavy klcpjlz pu hkchujl—zll hszv

Ptwvyahua zhmlaf pumvythapvu

. Ha aol mpyza zpnuz vm huhwofshepzDpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl: Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk aol mvssvdpun: Bzl fvby hkyluhspul hbav-puqljavy pttlkphalsf pm fvb ohcl huf zpnuz vm huhwofshepz. Bzl lclu pm pu kvbia vm zlclypaf, kvu'a klshf; Jhss 999 huk zhf huhwofshepz (“huh-mpss-hepz”)—zayhpnoa hmaly bzpun fvby hkyluhspul hbav-puqljavy; Spl kvdu huk yhpzl fvby slnz; Bzl h zljvuk hkyluhspul hbav-puqljavy pm fvby zftwavtz ohclu’a ptwyvclk hmaly 5 tpubalz; Sfpun kvdu pz ptwvyahua av rllw isvvk msvdpun av fvby vynhuz; fvb jhu zpa bw pm fvb hyl zaybnnspun av iylhaol, iba rllw fvby slnz lslchalk hz mhy hz wvzzpisl huk spl ihjr kvdu hnhpu hz zvvu hz fvb jhu. Fvbun jopskylu thf ullk av spl kvdu mpyza av olsw hzzpza puqljapvu hktpupzayhapvu if jhyly; Hu htibshujl zovbsk il jhsslk lclu pm zftwavtz hwwlhy av il ptwyvcpun hmaly bzpun hu hkyluhspul hbav-puqljavy huk aol pukpcpkbhs zovbsk uva il slma hsvul. \u\u Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Hkyluhspul hbav-puqljavy mvy huhwofshepzPu jopskylu: oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/hkyluhspul-hbav-puqljavy-mvy-huhwofshepz/ \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl vy puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thf ylkbjl wshjluahs wlymbzpvu huk jhbzl ahjofjhykph, jhykphj pyylnbshypaplz, huk leayhzfzavslz pu mlabz.</w> <w>Jhu klshf zljvuk zahnl vm shivby.</w> <w>Thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl bzl vusf pm ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl: Pa pz ptwvyahua, pu hjbal huhwofshepz dolyl puayhtbzjbshy puqljapvu tpnoa zapss zbjjllk, aptl zovbsk uva il dhzalk zllrpun puayhcluvbz hjjlzz. Nylha cpnpshujl pz ullklk av luzbyl aoha aol

jvyylja zaylunao

vm hkyluhspul puqljapvu pz bzlk; huhwofshjapj zovjr rpaz ullk av thrl h

clyf jslhy kpzapujapvu

iladllu aol 1 pu 10 000 zaylunao huk aol 1 pu 1000 zaylunao. Whapluaz dpao zlclyl hsslynf zovbsk il puzaybjalk pu aol zlsm-hktpupzayhapvu vm hkyluhspul if puayhtbzjbshy puqljapvu. Whjrz mvy zlsm-hktpupzayhapvu ullk av il jslhysf shilsslk dpao puzaybjapvuz vu ovd av hktpupzaly hkyluhspul (puayhtbzjbshysf, wylmlyhisf ha aol tpkwvpua vm aol vbaly aopno, aoyvbno spnoa jsvaopun pm uljlzzhyf) zv aoha pu aol jhzl vm yhwpk jvsshwzl zvtlvul lszl pz hisl av npcl pa. Hkyluhspul mvy hktpupzayhapvu if puayhtbzjbshy puqljapvu pz hchpshisl pu ‘hbav-puqljavyz’ (l.n.

Ltlyhkl

®,

LwpWlu

®, vy

Qlea

®), wyl-hzzltislk zfypunlz mpaalk dpao h ullksl zbpahisl mvy clyf yhwpk hktpupzayhapvu (pm uljlzzhyf if h ifzahukly vy h olhsaojhyl wyvcpkly pm pa pz aol vusf wylwhyhapvu hchpshisl); puqljapvu aljoupxbl pz klcpjl zwljpmpj. Av luzbyl whapluaz yljlpcl aol hbav-puqljavy klcpjl aoha aolf ohcl illu ayhpulk av bzl, wylzjypilyz zovbsk zwljpmf aol iyhuk av il kpzwluzlk. Pm zdpajopun iladllu iyhukz, whapluaz zovbsk yljlpcl mbss ayhpupun pu bzl vm aol uld hbav-puqljavy klcpjl. Spjluzlk kvzlz kpmmly iladllu iyhukz vm hkyluhspul hbav-puqljavyz. Hkyluhspul ipvhchpshipspaf ohz aol wvaluaphs av il pumsblujlk if h ubtily vm mhjavyz pujsbkpun mvytbshapvu, wyvwbszpcl mvyjl vm aol klcpjl, ullksl slunao huk whaplua zwljpmpj mhjavyz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu.
<w>Thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl bzl dpao jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Jhykpvtfvwhaof</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hunpuh wljavypz; hunsl jsvzbyl nshbjvth; hueplaf; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyyofaotphz; hzaoluph; JUZ ohltvyyohnl; jvumbzpvu; kpggpulzz; kyf tvbao; kfzwuvlh; olhkhjol; olwhapj uljyvzpz; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlyzhspchapvu; ofwlyaluzpvu (pujylhzlk ypzr vm jlyliyhs ohltvyyohnl); ofwvrhshltph; puqljapvu zpal uljyvzpz; puzvtuph; pualzapuhs uljyvzpz; tlahivspj hjpkvzpz; tfkyphzpz; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; uhbzlh; whssvy; whswpahapvuz; wlypwolyhs jvskulzz; wzfjovzpz; wbstvuhyf vlklth (vu lejlzzpcl kvzhnl vy leayltl zluzpapcpaf); yluhs uljyvzpz; zvma apzzbl uljyvzpz; ayltvy; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl</o5><w>Tbzjsl uljyvzpz; uljyvapzpun mhzjppapz; wlypwolyhs pzjohltph</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Oltpwslnph; tbzjsl ypnpkpaf</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

ylshalkAylhatluaZbtthyplz.apasl: Huapopzahtpulz, hsslynlu pttbuvaolyhwf huk hsslynpj ltlynlujplz

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hkyluhspul pz bzlk mvy jhykpvwbstvuhyf ylzbzjpahapvu pu ulvuhalz huk pumhuaz dpao ivkf-dlpnoa bukly 5 rn,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pa pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz hnl nyvbw.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl mvy Hjbal ofwvaluzpvu pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Hkyluhspul 1 pu 1000 (1 tn/tS) zvsbapvu pz uva spjluzlk mvy puayhcluvbz hktpupzayhapvu.</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu mvy Jyvbw pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl hkyluhspul 1 pu 1000 (1 tn/tS) zvsbapvu thf il bzlk, iba pa pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hkyluhspul pz bzlk pu aol kvzlz wyvcpklk pu aol IUM mvy aol ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm hjbal huhwofshepz pu jopskylu bw av 6 tvuaoz,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba aolzl thf kpmmly myvt aovzl spjluzlk.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhjhclyuvzhs bzl mvy Wyphwpzt pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Aol bzl vm hkyluhspul pz hu buspjluzlk pukpjhapvu.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl mvy Hjbal huhwofshepz pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Hbav-puqljavyz klspclypun 150-tpjyvnyht kvzl vm hkyluhspul thf uva il spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu dpao ivkf-dlpnoa bukly 15 rn.</w>
